text: For as long as it takes: Germany's support for Ukraine" 🇩🇪💪🏼🇺🇦 It's time to stand up against Russia's brutal war of aggression and support Ukraine in their fight for freedom and democracy. 💪🏼🇺🇦 Germany must continue to provide military aid, impose harsh sanctions on Russia, and host the international reconstruction conference URC24 in Berlin. 🌟🇩🇪 Let's add "Nothilfe Ukraine" (emergency aid for Ukraine) to our bank transfers and support relief measures for those affected by the war. 💔🇺🇦
